alert.note: Alert for Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 1:44AM CDT until July 16 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Yellow River at Babcock affecting Wood County. For the Yellow River...including Pittsville, Babcock...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yellow River at Babcock. * WHEN...From early this morning to this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Widespread flooding is occurring in wooded lowland and agricultural areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 13.1 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.
